dynamic_line: Oh, I work ere' on this land you see. We grow a variety of crops. Without us, this farm would go under, the harvest rot in the fields. It's the little guys that count, ya know.
Well, its ard' work, this farmin' we do. There's several of us just for this one field ya see. The boss is in his house, if yer still interested.
Were ya gonna say somthin' else?

responses.text: Who did you say you were?
